mapper.select: SELECT ER.EDU_NO, (SELECT CATEGORY1_NAME FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY1 WHERE CATEGORY1_KEY = ER.CATEGORY1_KEY) AS CATEGORY1 , (SELECT CATEGORY2_NAME FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY2 WHERE CATEGORY2_KEY = ER.CATEGORY2_KEY) AS CATEGORY2 , (SELECT CATEGORY3_NAME FROM EDU_CLASS_CATEGORY3 WHERE CATEGORY3_KEY = ER.CATEGORY3_KEY) AS CATEGORY3 , ER.INST_NM, ER.TRAIN_S_DATE, ER.TRAIN_E_DATE, ER.EDU_METHOD,ER.EDU_TIME, ER.EDU_NOTICE, ERD.EDU_INTRO, ERD.EDU_GOALS, ERD.EDU_CURR1, ERD.EDU_CURR2, ERD.EDU_CURR3, ER.EDU_TARGET, ER.EDU_STATUS FROM EDU_REGISTRATION ER LEFT OUTER JOIN EDU_REGISTRATION_DETAIL ERD ON ER.EDU_NO = ERD.EDU_NO WHERE 1=1 AND ER.EDU_NO = ${edu_no}
